column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
i have a i have something that itches on my balls

I understand that you have an itchy area on your scrotum. It is best to be examined by a medical professional, as this could be a sign of infection or irritation. It is important that you visit a doctor as soon as possible. In the meantime, it is best to avoid any excessive scratching and to keep the area clean and dry.
i have a bit of a funny tummy since taking cocaine

I understand that you have a funny feeling in your stomach after taking cocaine. Taking cocaine can cause a range of gastrointestinal issues, including nausea, vomiting, and abdominal discomfort. It is important that you seek medical attention right away. You should also avoid taking any further cocaine until you have assessed any potential health risks associated with further use.
